snippet.title: Crossroads Inn 2 - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description: Crossroads Inn 2 is a tavern management simulator game developed by Klabater. Players will face the trials and tribulations of managing an inn from planning, building, and furnishing their establishment from scratch. Tasks to become successful in the game will range from managing their staff, creating menus, and catering to the needs of the guests from normal common folk to outlaws. Crossroads Inn 2 is launching in 2024 for PC.
